verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* control \w himself|strong="H3045"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* attendants, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Send|strong="H3318"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*!” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3130"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w himself|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w wept|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w loudly|strong="H6963"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* soon \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* brothers, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*! \w Is|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* father \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*?” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3130"\w* \w unable|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3130"\w* terrified \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3130"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H4376"\w* brothers, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4714"\w* they did \w so|strong="H5066"\w*. “\w I|strong="H4714"\w* am \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w your|strong="H4994"\w* brother,” \w he|strong="H3130"\w* said, “\w the|strong="H5066"\w* one \w you|strong="H4994"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*!

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w distressed|strong="H2734"\w* \w or|strong="H4376"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w into|strong="H4376"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* place, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* save lives \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* covered \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w two|strong="H2088"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H2568"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w without|strong="H8141"\w* \w plowing|strong="H2758"\w* \w or|strong="H2568"\w* \w harvesting|strong="H7105"\w*.

\w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w preserve|strong="H2421"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w save|strong="H2421"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w lives|strong="H2421"\w* \w by|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H6413"\w*.\f + \fr 45:7 \ft Or and to keep you alive as a great band of survivors\f*

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* father \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*—lord \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. Joseph Sends for His Father

\w Now|strong="H7760"\w* return \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*, ‘\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: God \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* lord \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* without \w delay|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*—\w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandchildren|strong="H1121"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w provide|strong="H3557"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*. \w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* own \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w come|strong="H3423"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* destitution.’

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*! \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* brother \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, Joseph, am \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H6310"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w splendor|strong="H3519"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* Joseph \w threw|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* arms \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w and|strong="H1144"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w and|strong="H1144"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w as|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* embraced.

Joseph \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H1696"\w* afterward \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. Pharaoh Invites Jacob to Egypt

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w news|strong="H6963"\w* reached \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s brothers \w had|strong="H3130"\w* come, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “Tell \w your|strong="H6213"\w* brothers, ‘\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* follows: \w Load|strong="H2943"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* animals \w and|strong="H3212"\w* return \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* father \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* return \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w best|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* eat \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land.’

\w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H4714"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* directed \w to|strong="H6213"\w* tell \w them|strong="H6213"\w*: ‘\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* land \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* young \w children|strong="H2945"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* father \w and|strong="H4714"\w* come \w back|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* pay \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* belongings, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w best|strong="H2898"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* yours.’”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* instructed, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w He|strong="H2568"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* new \w garments|strong="H8071"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w he|strong="H2568"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 45:22 \ft 300 shekels is approximately 7.5 pounds or 3.4 kilograms of silver.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w sets|strong="H2487"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* father \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w following|strong="H1870"\w*: \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w loaded|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w best|strong="H2898"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* female \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w loaded|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w grain|strong="H1250"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w provisions|strong="H4202"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* father’s \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Joseph \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* brothers \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w as|strong="H7264"\w* \w they|strong="H1870"\w* \w were|strong="H1870"\w* leaving, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w quarrel|strong="H7264"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*!” The Revival of Jacob

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* brothers \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5927"\w* \w of|strong="H5927"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H3290"\w* father \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w in|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* land \w of|strong="H5927"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

“\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* Jacob \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w stunned|strong="H6313"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w them|strong="H5046"\w*.

However, \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H1697"\w* relayed \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* back, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* father \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w revived|strong="H2421"\w*.

“\w Enough|strong="H7227"\w*!” declared \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. “\w My|strong="H7200"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*! \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”
